email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, with an LOA of 280 meters. The laycan is 15-20 October. Our starting freight quote is $52.50 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider lowering it to the low 50s, say $50.75? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $51.00 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $51.00 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with this rate. Please confirm the laycan remains 15-20 October and send over the charter party for review. Also, confirm the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear that. Yes, the laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. I’ll send over the charter party shortly for your review. Let me know if you need any further adjustments. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick turnaround. I’ve reviewed the charter party, and everything looks good. We’ll proceed as agreed. Let’s finalize the paperwork. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry - Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent. I’ll finalize the paperwork and send it over for signature. Thanks for your cooperation, and let’s keep in touch for future shipments. Best regards, Sarah
